widgets.name: My PDF Activity
widgets.description: Show your reading PDF list contains the file information and link to resume your reading progress

widgets.name: My Video Activity
widgets.description: Show your video list contains the file information and the link to resume your video learning progress

widgets.name: My Activity in Created Courses
widgets.description: Show your created courses list, including the statistics of your activities for each node in the courses that you created

widgets.name: My Activity in Enrolled Courses
widgets.description: Show your enrolled courses list, including the statistics of your activities for each node in the courses that you have enrolled

widgets.name: My Activity Summary
widgets.description: Show the statistic summary of your activities
